alert.note: Alert for Chattooga; Fannin; Floyd; Gilmer; Gordon; Murray; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 3:11PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Gilmer, Murray, northeastern Floyd, southeastern Whitfield, southeastern Walker, central Gordon, northeastern Chattooga and west central Fannin Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 311 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Conasauga Lake to near Sugar Valley, and moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dalton, Calhoun, Chatsworth, Blue Ridge, Eton, Resaca, Carters, Tails Creek, Ramhurst, Oostanaula, Subligna, Redbud, Lake Marvin, Tilton, Audubon, Conasauga Lake, Sugar Valley, Mountaintown, Oakman, and Fort Mountain State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Chattooga; Fannin; Floyd; Gilmer; Gordon; Murray; Walker; Whitfield
